title: RP Game Builder Kit Core
description: A C++ Plugin to streamline developing RP Games using Unreal Engine 4.2.x
longDescription: The RPG Game Builder Core, is the core module for the plugin package series. The core provides you with a plugin that allows you to quickly create an RPG playable character, with combat abilities, equiped weapons and armor, and save states. You can create blueprints out of many C++ classes like the PlayerCharacterBase and BattlePlayerController which work together to streamline setting up a fully playable 3D RPG character. Together with the BattleGameInstance, BattleGameState, BattleGameMode and BattlePlayerState, this plugin is a complete starter package for building 3D RPG games. Note this is a Beta product and we are now selling early access.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Custom Player Character
  • Custom Player controller with ability system
  • Custom Game Instance for level loading and saved games
  • Custom Game State for game flow statemachine
  • Custom Plater State for a player actions statemachine
  • Equipable Weapons and Armor
  • C++ Driven Inventory System (includes game saving}
  • Dynamic Class Change at runtime
  • Combat Proficiencies with skills to unlock
  • BattleClassComponent allows for blueprint configured BattleClassDescriptor for dynamic class swiching.
  • Custom Animation Component to help streamline animating movements from BattlePlayerController

Code Modules:

  • RPGGameBuilderCore Runtime

Number of Blueprints: 0

Number of C++ Classes: 66

Network Replicated: (Yes/No) NO

Supported Development Platforms: Win32, Win64

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows

Documentation: Included in plugin download


Important/Additional Notes: This is a beta early access product with the final release soon.
